# Bug Report

**1. What is broken?**
_Describe the issue clearly. (e.g., "DNS setup command is wrong," "Mobile menu glitch," "Dead link on Home page")_

>

**2. Affected Page / Section:**
_Which URL or section is this happening on? (e.g., `/self-hosting/dns`, `Introduction`)_

>

**3. Browser & Device:**
_What are you using? (e.g., Chrome on School Chromebook, Safari on iPhone, Firefox on Windows)_

>

**4. Steps to Reproduce:**
_How can we make this happen?_

1. Go to...
2. Click...
3. See error...

**5. Screenshots / Logs (Optional):**
_If you see a layout issue or error message, a screenshot helps a lot. If a command failed, paste the output here._

>

---

**Confirmation:**

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this bug hasn't already been reported.
